text: the meal was alright but on the pricey side for a casual restaurant and the waiters had a somewhat detached demeanor
although i found the cleanliness and appearance of this place commendable my visit with a friend was somewhat dulled by the dull atmosphere maybe injecting some liveliness would improve it

my dining experience was elevated thanks to the incredible combination of flavors in the chicken shawarma hummus falafel and salad to top it off the inclusion of a sizeable velvety pita bread made the meal even more memorable in contrast to the usual cardboardlike texture of most pitas this one was exceptionally fresh light and allaround fantastic
the exceptional pizza wing special that is always accessible is topnotch
the location i went to earlier today specifically at 11212 was discovered to be shut down

despite the fact that this store emphasizes its attractive discounts their takeout selections disappoint in terms of taste especially their pizza which has an unpleasant flavor and a truly unappealing crust resulting in us throwing away most of it
the cleanliness and pleasant appearance of this place were praiseworthy however the atmosphere felt lackluster when i visited with a friend perhaps infusing some vibrancy would make it better

i watched the movie g force in 3d at this place where tickets cost 1050 the average theater was spacious wellmaintained and had excellent sound quality it made me happy just before entering theres a food court so its convenient to carry a big bag and purchase your food beforehand did i mention that
while the cleanliness and appearance of this place were commendable the atmosphere felt somewhat dull during my visit with a friend  perhaps some vibrancy would enhance it
the price wasnt justified and i have no desire to return as it was quite uneventful

i made two attempts to make a reservation at this particular restaurant for a delightful dinner but my experiences were quite disappointing on the first occasion the staff asked us to wait on the line to confirm our booking but they kept us waiting without any update until we finally had no option but to end the call unfortunately even when i tried to contact them again they didnt bother to pick up the phone its really disheartening that despite hearing great things about the scrumptious food served here i wont be considering giving them my business
would it be correct to classify this eatery as a fast food joint if they stop serving breakfast at 10 am
can i consider this place a fast food restaurant even though they only serve breakfast until 10 am
the store provides exceptional discounts however regrettably their pizza is unsatisfying and as a result we had to discard the majority of it due to its dreadful crust

food is okay but service was one of the worst ive ever seen  perhaps the waiter didnt like us because we only ordered appetizers and beer  but i would not expect this kind of attitude at this kind of restaurant

overall the experience was highly enjoyable because of the prompt and congenial service from a wellinformed order taker however my only hesitation in giving it a perfect fivestar rating was the lack of a clearly designated choice for a smoothie with reduced carbs or sugar the nutritional details provided on the menu were perplexing although the actual flavor of the smoothie was pleasing

the waiting time for the food was excessively long and the taste fell below expectations however the redeeming quality of the restaurant lies in its impressive display of united states art in the dining area which adds to its appeal additionally the children found great joy in exploring the artwork depicting the states

this place has captured my heart entirely as ive remained a loyal customer for an extensive period becoming adept at preparing their distinctive specialty dish i eagerly anticipate their continual introduction of fresh menu selections all prepared with great care using topquality ingredients notably their exceptional service ensures swift queues while every member of the staff from management to employees consistently exude friendliness and courtesy
i have never tasted such terrible food like this pizza

contemplating the number of stars to award my uncertainty arises from the contrasting qualities of this establishment undoubtedly the food is superb particularly the highly enjoyable x girlfriend roll unfortunately the service consistently proves to be utterly deplorable no matter how many times i have visited each encounter leaves me dismayed by the persistently grumpy and unmotivated staff members prompting me to seriously consider not returning here in the future
good deli sandwiches otherwise its a boutique with boutique prices just another snobby place sorry sprouts i expected better
affordable clean the employees are helpful and happy to help you im going back and will bring friends great place for locals
delicious fresh fruit smoothies and veggie food too

the pizza wing special that is constantly on offer is truly outstanding
i have visited this place on four occasions and every time my spray tan experience has been fantastic i plan on returning here again very soon

the outdoor seating during summer is pleasant and enjoyable serving decent coffee with a distinctive ambiance however its disappointing that they do not provide internet access on the weekends what era are we living in although i comprehend the need for coffee shops to optimize customer flow the weak internet connection persists even throughout weekdays
eating this pizza was the most unpleasant culinary experience of my life

the selfcheckout option in the clean store is an advantage although the pharmacy used to be open 24 hours until they discontinued that service consequently i shifted my shopping routine to a store located closer to me due to this change moreover there have been consistent issues with them not having my prescribed medications in stock which has been quite inconvenient additionally indulging in their fried chicken has become my guilty pleasure
looks like marie calendars again so glad  missed the pies
despite its excellent prices this store falls short when it comes to their pizza  its quite awful with such a bad crust that we had to throw away most of it

i really love innout but this specific location is terrible when my order was delivered the food was cold and i had to wait at the drivethru window for over 20 minutes its quite disappointing how inefficient they can be considering all i ordered was a burger they seriously need to improve their performance

i tried on two occasions to make a reservation at this particular restaurant for an evening meal during the first attempt the staff requested that we wait on the line only to keep us waiting indefinitely until we finally decided to end the call disappointingly during my second endeavor they didnt even bother picking up the phone its a shame because ive heard great things about the quality of their cuisine but i wont be choosing this place as my dining destination

while this shop prides itself on offering excellent deals their takeaway choices are lacking in terms of quality particularly their pizza which has an extremely unappetizing flavor and a crust that is utterly disagreeable leading us to discard most of it

i came to this place without a reservation but they still accommodated me albeit at a higher cost and their level of expertise in nail services was below average thankfully i received a discount by checking in yet my final bill amounted to 95

despite my fondness for dining at innout the subpar service at this specific branch has left me discontented i was let down when my order arrived with cold food and my frustration heightened during the lengthy 20minute wait at the drivethru window despite simply ordering a burger the inefficiency exhibited by the employees seriously impacts the overall customer experience and it is essential that these problems be rectified as soon as possible
at one point in history these gentlemen possessed substantial capabilities however the current landscape demands a different approach warranting ones consideration of alternative options

when it comes to deciding on how many stars to give i cant help but feel conflicted due to the stark differences in this place undoubtedly the food is exceptional especially the delightful x girlfriend roll however the service consistently disappoints leaving me disheartened by the perpetually grouchy and unenthusiastic staff this makes me seriously contemplate whether or not to come back here again

the summertime offers a delightful and charming experience with their lovely outdoor seating area the coffee served has its own unique vibe on the downside the absence of internet connectivity on weekends leaves much to be desired it feels perplexing to witness such a setback in todays time moreover the internet connection tends to drop frequently even during weekdays
the crispy duck with drunken noodles at the thai restaurant was cooked perfectly making it the most amazing thai food ive ever tasted

have you thought about implementing signage indicating the hours of operation it seems like multiple groups had to endure long waits therefore having a digital sign displaying closed would greatly enhance customer service
previously these individuals boasted remarkable proficiency but as time has progressed it is advisable to seek out alternative solutions

the food was satisfactory but the prices leaned towards the higher side for a casual dining establishment and the servers appeared somewhat aloof
the quality of the meal was decent yet the prices were slightly on the expensive side for a casual eatery and the servers exhibited a somewhat detached mannerism
the ambience seemed lacking when i went to this place with a friend it was clean and nice but it could use more liveliness

im actually not a particularly big fan of starbucks for their coffee i find it kind of acidic and a bit strong for my liking i am a fan of their frapachinos and pastries but alas far too many calories for me to visit consistantly

i have a strong affinity for innout however this specific establishment fails to meet expectations on one occasion the meal i received was served cold while the duration of my stay at the drivethru exceeded 20 minutes given that i had merely ordered a burger this lack of efficiency displayed by the staff is truly disheartening it is indispensable that they make improvements promptly

i formerly adored wicked spoon yet this establishment has transformed into my number one goto for buffets in las vegas each dish surpassed expectations and there werent any glaring errors that i could discern though certain items may outshine others the general grandeur of this buffet was truly remarkable

i did not like their food at all had one dish sent it back the second plate was just as horrible not close to authentic mexican food at all the atmosphere is very nice though the authentic music made the atmosphere even better havent gone back since i went the first time go at your own risk

it was difficult for me to determine the appropriate number of stars to rate this place despite the delicious food and my adoration for the x girlfriend roll however i have experienced consistently terrible service on multiple visits with the same unenthusiastic and resentful attitudes from the staff due to this unpleasant experience it is unlikely that i will return in the future

for numerous years ive nurtured an intense fondness for this establishment truly devoted as a returning customer its fascinating how ive honed my skills in recreating their iconic culinary masterpiece while the everevolving menu never fails to amaze with its appetizing options made exclusively from fresh ingredients remarkably the service provided is beyond compare with efficiently moving lines and a team of professionals who are not only attentive and respectful but also warmhearted

i have been to this location four times and each time my spray tan experience has been amazing i intend to come back here again in the near future

even though the food was delicious and i had a particular affinity for the x girlfriend roll i faced difficulty in determining an appropriate rating for this place due to the consistently appalling service and the staffs unenthusiastic and resentful attitudes given this unpleasant experience the chances of me coming back in the future are highly unlikely

even though i have a preference for dining at innout i am dissatisfied with the level of service provided at this particular location my disappointment stems from receiving cold food after placing an order as well as enduring over a 20minute wait at the drivethru window despite only ordering a burger the employees ineffective performance hinders the overall satisfaction of customers and it is imperative that these issues are resolved promptly

i had a complete feast indulging myself in the flavorsome chicken shawarma complemented by a side of hummus falafel salad and a wonderfully fluffy pita bread this remarkable combination truly impressed me especially considering how most pita tends to be tough and thin instead this particular bread was undeniably soft airy and incredibly enjoyable to bite into
kinda weird for a japanese place to be in a diner food was expensive and not that great   if im paying these prices i want good quality   id pass on this place

mall doesnt have the best stores but has a footlocker eyebrow cart and bath and body works which are some of my favorites tons of parking as well def not your hang out kind of mall but since its conviently near me ill support the place

this thai restaurant truly blew my mind with their flawlesslycooked crispy duck and extraordinary drunken noodles undoubtedly standing out as the epitome of the finest thai food ive ever enjoyed
one of my favorite places to eat if im looking for cheap and fast

for my initial visit i decided to sample the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel although it wasnt the absolute worst the chicken lacked sufficient flavor to grab my attention while the falafel which im not an expert on had an overpowering parsley taste that resulted in a strong bitter and grassy sensation
the consistently available pizza wing special stands out for its excellence

the entire experience of savoring the chicken shawarma alongside hummus falafel salad and a generous portion of pillowysoft pita bread was absolutely delightful it stood out from other meals because of its exceptional taste and texture – a far cry from the usual hard and thin pita typically encountered
having been here four times already i can confidently say that each visit has provided me with a wonderful spray tan experience it wont be long before i return for another round
the only thing fast about this fast food joint is the employee turnovernnlong waits in line and understaffed by people who dont want to be therenntruly dreadful

this place holds a special place in my heart ive frequented it for several years now honing my skills to prepare their famous smash dish perfectly they constantly innovate their menu offering a plethora of new choices that are always prepared with utmost freshness and exquisite flavors the waiting times are impressively short thanks to the efficient service the management and staff never fail to delight with their warm and affable nature

i had a fantastic experience overall thanks to the fast and friendly service as well as the helpful staff member who assisted me with my order the only drawback was the absence of a clearly indicated choice for a smoothie with reduced carbs or sugar which became puzzling because of the unclear nutritional details provided on the menu

although the food was delicious and i loved the x girlfriend roll i found it challenging to decide how many stars to give this place because of consistently poor service and unfriendly attitudes from the staff this unpleasant experience makes it unlikely that i will come back in the future

i absolutely adore this place ive been a loyal customer for years and ive become an expert at making their signature dish they continually introduce new menu options and everything is consistently delicious and made with fresh ingredients the service is exceptional and the lines move briskly the management and staff are always friendly and courteous
the ambiance of this place is undeniably elegant and remarkably inviting however the prices are exorbitant for the offerings where a simple glass of wine will set you back 20

noisy chicken special woefully under seasonedsince when is risotto crunchy  i wonder if the chef bothers to taste the food he is serving  would not return there are many far better options in the general vicinity

it was mediocre considering the high cost for a diner and the wait staff displayed a hint of aloofness

on my first visit i opted for the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel although it didnt rank as the most disappointing meal ever the chicken didnt have enough flavor to captivate me as for the falafel i dont consider myself an expert but there was an overwhelming presence of parsley resulting in a pronounced bitter and grasslike taste

efforts were exerted on two occasions to secure a booking at this particular establishment for a pleasant dinner yet the experiences turned out to be highly unsatisfactory during the initial attempt the staff instructed us to wait on the line in order to validate our reservation however they irresponsibly neglected to provide any updates and left us in limbo until we were compelled to terminate the call regrettably when i made another attempt to reach out to them they didnt display the basic courtesy of answering the phone despite the positive feedback about the delectable cuisine offered by this place it is with regret that i will not consider patronizing it

this hummus is truly exceptional i include it in countless recipes due to its wide array of delectable flavors personally i love pairing garlic hummus with beet hummus while the remaining varieties serve as delightful enhancements that enrich the taste of my dishes

while the food is decent the portion sizes tend to be on the smaller side and the average cost for a main dish is approximately 50 nevertheless the stunning scenery makes it worthwhile to ascend and enjoy the view personally my plan for the future is to dine at a more delectable establishment and solely visit this location for its bar and lounge amenities
in the past these men held significant skills and abilities but the present situation requires a new strategy that should make us think about other choices

this pizza i just ate was the most distressing dining experience ive ever had

i tried twice to secure a table at this specific eatery in order to have an enjoyable dining experience but unfortunately my encounters were far from satisfactory the initial time i reached out to them the staff told me to hold the line so that they could confirm my reservation however they left me hanging and never followed up forcing me to hang up eventually regrettably when i decided to contact them once more they didnt have the decency to answer the phone at all its really unfortunate that even though ive heard positive reviews about their mouthwatering dishes i wont be contemplating going there anymore
the dining experience was average although slightly overpriced for a diner and the wait staff seemed somewhat distant
